alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Woods (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 1:46AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Woods and central Alfalfa Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 143 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from the state line 9 miles west of Hardtner Kansas to 3 miles southwest of Lambert. Movement was east-southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alva, Cherokee, Helena, Carmen, Goltry, Jet, Burlington, Dacoma, Lambert, Ingersoll, Capron, and southwestern Great Salt Plains Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
